overview: This site is an independent review industry website specializing in informing both small and medium sized business owners as well as those utilizing project management software on a daily basis. These types of software have multiple uses and are a vital way to keep track of all your daily tasks. The complexity of these can send a few heads spinning. This webpage specializes in helping one choose the best possible software for his needs. We will go beyond naming the various features offered out there, as we are not sales representatives. Instead we focus on helping you make not only an informed choice, but also an educated one. We have access to industry experts on the matter, both on the developers side and the consumers side. Our key advantage is by utilizing those software customers, we are able to steer clear of all promotional messages from the manufacturers and bring you anecdotal evidence straight from the source.
